statements: UPDATE player_interactions SET in_game_chat_message = 'Hello, world!' WHERE player_id = 1;

UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'combat' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_interactions SET in_game_chat_message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='login' WHERE player_id='12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE chat_messages SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE player_id='87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE chat_messages SET message_text = 'New message content', message_timestamp = now() WHERE message_id = '345e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 100
UPDATE in_game_chat SET message = 'New message', player_id = 200, chat_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE chat_id = 500
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Game Completed' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE in_game_chat SET message = 'Hello, World!' WHERE chat_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE player_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = '2023-10-15 14:30:00' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_behavior_analysis SET behavior_type = 'Active' WHERE analysis_id = '75c5e06d-1d2a-4d4a-829a-34d4a8f80c5b';
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1001;
UPDATE sessions SET end_time = '2022-03-15 18:30:00' WHERE session_id = 2003;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, account_created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE chat_messages SET message_text = 'Updated message text', message_timestamp = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE message_id = 201;
